pages.text: I've obtained a unique herb. Herbs should be useful for survival.$(br2)Not only can some of them be eaten for basic hunger, but many of them possess unique properties, both alchemical and otherwise.

I will use this section of my journal to record my findings of each herb I come across.$(br2)Only herbs with magical properties are recorded here.$(br2)For herbs' alchemical applications, I will record my findings under the Alchemy section.

pages.title: Black Apple
pages.text: Native to the Nether, these deep black apples, while appearing poisonous, are actually deceptively helpful, capable of restoring one's health beyond what you may expect.

pages.title: Blastem Fruit
pages.text: Native to the Defiled Lands, this fruit can be tossed, exploding on impact. I should also be careful when handling matured blastem plants.

pages.title: Brown Elder Mushroon
pages.text: This curious mushroom seems to grow on Brown Mogus, and are incapable of spreading. Consuming one seems to be detrimental to one's health, however, I am completely full after eating just one.

pages.title: Cave Root Sprout
pages.text: An otherwise normal root when consumed, having the usual cave root bitter taste. For some reason, though, my body is not a natural color after eating one...

pages.title: Chorus Fruit
pages.text: Native to the End, this fruit grows on chorus stalks. Upon eating one, my body is completely displaced from its original location. Odd.

pages.title: Cloudsbluff
pages.text: Found atop mountains, this herb is like a little cloud and lighter than air. Eating one is like eating air, including causing one to levitate off the ground for a short time.

pages.title: Ironberry
pages.text: A displeasing berry with a metallic taste and heavy as iron. Eating one causes me to be unable to move for a short time.

pages.title: Red Elder Mushroom
pages.text: This curious mushroom seems to grow on Red Mogus, and are incapable of spreading. Consuming one leaves me feeling incredibly healthy and refreshed, although my stomach seems empty now.

pages.title: Sanguine Rose
pages.text: A beautiful crimson rose that when stood nearby, revitalizes one's health.

pages.title: White Apple
pages.text: Native to the Aether, growing on Crystal Trees. These pale white apples leave one cured of all ailments.
